page.title: 08WEST KILBRIDE SCHOOL (2)
page.content: At present there are{19 classes}in our school and{21 teachers,}plus visiting teachers for needlework, art, violin, piano and cello. Most classes have less than 30 children in them_the maximum number of pupils should be 33. All of the classes, except the three primary 7s, are accommodated in a semi-open plan building. This means that most of the "bases" do not have a fourth wall. Instead, they look out on to a central activity area. Some of the teachers complain that it is too noisy in the new school but others prefer it because it is bright and modern. At the present time there are very few extra_ curricular activities because Scottish teachers are involved in a pay dispute with the Government. Teachers in our school have also been on{strike}because of this.
